name: The Other Village
description:
The Other Village is not your typical psychological horror game, the game will play with you as you play with it.

Take the role of the Finder, the only one able to bring order to a world at the brink of extinction.

Can you find that which has been lost?

------------------------------------------------

Created for the 2021 Global Game Jam.

Theme: Lost and found.

Created by ThorGameDev, Jonrei and Anchry
